character.statement: Uh... just dropping in to say hi.
Wait! You'll be --
You'll never get away with this!
Here goes nothing.
I need help to find the right lamp!
It's easy: just pick one lamp and place it on the altar.
If it's the right one, you'll be set free!
Yes, the altar will destroy anyone who places the wrong lamp on it.
Then you'd better pick the right one!
Not again!
We'll run out of prisoners before we ever run out of lamps.
Take this interloper to a cell!
We'll deal with you later. Back to work, everyone.
Not so fast. The magical lamp is mine. Show it to me!
Don't let him get away!
Don't let her get away!
Well, well, well... isn't this a familiar scene.
Ha, if I had a gold piece for every time I heard that!
Silence!
Get on with it kid, or I'll have tiny here teach you how.
But the... the... curse!
Whew!
...wait, what's happening?
I'm quite busy here, don't you need to be somewhere?
yes, Finally recounted my precious coins!
Eek! Guards!
Don't touch those lamps!
Oh no! The gold!
I've lost count! I've lost count!
Oh no! Not again!
Uh...
Don't touch my coins, I'll lose count!
Follow me, quietly.
We need to somehow distract him to get to the lamps.
Fine work! Let's get to the lamps.
Let's get out of here before the thieves find us!
Of course, of course. No cause for alarm.
I will, indeed, show you the correct lamp.
Go! Now!
Stop, He'll see you!
